ygData.subject: Has the Lugubrious Lament Been Nerfed??
ygData.msgSnippet: In the last week or so I have seen a REALLY troubling trend with our level 8 song, the Lugubrious Lament, lovingly known simply as The Lull Song by most of
ygData.messageBody:
In the last week or so I have seen a REALLY troubling trend with our level 8
song, the Lugubrious Lament, lovingly known simply as "The Lull Song" by most
of us.

Simply put, this song has been basically USELESS for me lately!

I have been living in the Ocean of Tears pretty much exclusively since level 20
(I am almost 27 now), and the things that I used to be able to lull with ease
now ignore me over half the time!

This isn't just a bad run... this has been consistent for about 4 or 5 days
now. I used to be able to lull the whole Pirate of Gunthak camp and waltz in
and pull the Captain. Now, I ALWAYS get at least one other pirate on me at the
same time. Fighting Isle Goblins this morning, I was only able to lull one out
of 4 goblins... when before, I would lull everyone with ease.

Has anyone else noticed this? Or am I just experiencing some really wacked out
statistically bad luck?

Jyzan
